name: Nobuyuki Shmup
description:
Simple shmup in development phase. Will update when I get more time. 

The year is 20XXX, you are Nobuyuki Johnson, a interstellar music producer that needs to go 200mph with a companion of exotic characteristics (not a sex game). You will shoot through asteroids only to find out your boss doesn't want you to use the company car for non-company errands. Understandable, but what happens next on the planet you landed on will change you forever. 

Check out Nobuyuki's music here!

https://nobuyukijohnson.bandcamp.com/
